name: Powerball Destiny
description: Fortune isn't just about chance; it’s about resonance. Powerball Destiny blends the traditional logic of Zi Wei Dou Shu (Purple Star Astrology) with a mindful interface designed to sharpen your intuition. Whether you are navigating your career or looking for the winning numbers in tonight’s game, our unique "Mindful Draw" feature guides you to clear your headspace, set your intention, and ask the Purple Star for guidance. Experience a ritual-driven approach to luck where every press of the button is a moment of total focus.
